entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 10:43 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:43 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of freezing drizzle. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 10:43 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
